group_1.textLeft: Alright, it's time for the final@strategy meeting!

group_1.textRight: Yes...!

group_1.textLeft: There's not much time left, so we can't@search for kanji cards far away.

group_1.textRight: Right.
Also, most of the stores are already out@of cards.
So we have to make a word using the kanji@we have now...?

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, let's see…
“Half-boiled egg” 「半熟玉子」, “unidentified”@「身元不明」, and ”body hair removal” 「全身脱毛」...

group_1.textRight: Those are no good...

group_1.textLeft: Yeah...“hard-boiled egg” 「半熟玉子」is@the best word I can think of.

group_1.textRight: It'll be hard to win if we pick that word.

group_1.textLeft: I knew it... We’re gonna have to find@a new card then!

group_1.textRight: Yeah!
We want to win first place, after all...!
Even so, the available kanji left are@already limited.

group_1.textLeft: We don’t have much time, so we should look@for kanji near here.

group_1.textRight: How about...this one in Sankyo Ward?

group_1.narration: Hint…@Our shop is “full”「満」 of merchandise!@Come and buy our “manly”「漢」Decagon Ball merch!

group_1.textLeft: Hm...Ah!@This could work!

group_1.textRight: Eh... Do you have a plan, Sayaka?

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, I might have thought of a way to turn@the tables around at the last minute!

group_1.textRight: Really?!

group_1.textLeft: I’ll explain later!@Let’s hurry!
First...we need to hurry and find those two@kanji right away!

group_1.textRight: Decagon Ball...?

group_1.textLeft: Does anyone know it?

group_1.textRight: Yeah!
I'm a Decagon Ball expert,@leave it to me!!
C'mon, this is the store!
Excuse me!@Are there any kanji cards left?!

group_1.textLeft: Yes, this is the last one.

group_1.textRight: Wow, that was close...!

group_1.textLeft: We got the “full” 「満」 and “manly” 「漢」 kanji!!
Thank you for showing us around!

group_1.textRight: ...This should be enough, right?

group_1.textLeft: Let’s check the cards we have right now.

group_1.textRight: Okay!
Uhm, the cards we have are...

group_1.narration: “Member” 「員」, “all” 「全」, “field” 「野」,@“child” 「子」, “complete” 「熟」, ”sphere” 「玉」,@”half” 「半], “former” 「元」, ”body” 「身」,@“down” 「下」, “clear” 「明」, “removal” 「脱」,@“hair” 「毛」, “strength” 「力」, “train” 「鍛」,@“negative” 「無」, “end” 「完」, “full” 「満」,@and “manly” 「漢」.

group_1.textRight: So, what’s your plan, Sayaka?
I still can’t think of anything other than@“half-boiled egg” 「半熱玉子」...

group_1.textLeft: We still need one more kanji.

group_1.textRight: Oh, we don’t have everything we need@right now?
...We might have enough time to visit one@more store around here.

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, I want to get one more card...
Look!@This hint for Sankyo Ward...

group_1.narration: Hint…@“Seats” 「席」 are “limited” 「限」, so hurry up and@see our famous golden kagami mochi!

group_1.textRight: “Seat” 「席」 and “limit”「限」..?
What word are you planning to write@using this...?
Are you going to use the other two we@got before too?

group_1.textLeft: *Giggle*...@That's right.

group_1.textRight: A word that expresses congratulations...@I wonder...

group_1.textLeft: That’s right...the last piece of the puzzle is the “all”@「全」 kanji. Combined  “full” 「満」, “manly” 「漢」...
...and hopefully “seat” 「席」,@we can form...
Wooaahh!![chara:100352:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]

group_1.textRight: ...?![chara:100153:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]
…H-huh?!

group_1.textLeft: It's a legendary Chinese menu!
Legend says, it was so luxurious that@it took them days to eat it all!

group_1.textRight: It seems we just struck gold.

group_1.textLeft: *Giggle*...!
Oh...I just looked it up...
It sounds very...festive.

group_1.textRight: I think it’s a good word;@it’s unique and adds a twist.
You could surprise the judges.
Sounds good!

group_1.textLeft: Okay, the last kanji...
We have to find it, no matter what!
